job.title: Software Development Engineer in Test(SDET)
job.description: <ul><li>4+ years of experience with functional testing</li><li>2+ years of experience testing complex B2B or consumer facing applications</li><li>2+ years of experience testing backend REST services, </li><li>1+ years of experience building robust test automation suites</li><li>1+ years of experience in Selenium or other GUI automation tools. </li><li>2+ years working experience under Agile methodology.</li><li>Experience building CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins/ or similar tools.</li><li>Knowledgeable in best practices for functional test strategy. </li><li>Able to take the initiative and drive change.</li><li>Strong leadership identity.</li><li>Excellent verbal and written communication.</li><li>Great team collaboration skills.</li><li>Experience with AWS technologies</li></ul><p></p>
